skills.name: Sinful Butterfly
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 0] The weapon active's CD, max charges, and effects are based on wielder type. Casting weapon active summons 4 Lightning Butterflies that last 10s to the caster. When the caster deals Lightning DMG or the butterflies expire, the butterflies fly to enemies, each dealing 280.0% Lightning DMG. The caster deals 12.0% bonus Lightning DMG against enemies damaged by the butterflies within 30.0s. CD: 10s.
